import { useGlobalContext } from "./context"; export const SignUp = () => { const { signingUp } = useGlobalContext(); const handleSignUp = ({ uname, pass }) => { fetch("http://localhost:1337/api/usersapis", { method: "POST", mode: "cors", body: JSON.stringify({ uname, pass }), // body data type must match "Content-Type" header }); }; return ( <>
handleSignUp({ uname: e.target.uname.value, pass: e.target.psw.value, }) } >

Sign Up

Please fill in this form to create an account.




{" "}
); };
